abstract: Virginia authorities file suit to block closing of Sweet Briar College, 114-year-old women’s liberal arts institution in rural Amherst County.
lead_paragraph: State authorities filed suit to block the closing of Sweet Briar College, giving a boost to alumnae and faculty who are fighting to save the 114-year-old women’s liberal arts institution.

headline.main: Virginia: Suit Seeks to Prevent College From Closing
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Suit Seeks to Prevent College From Closing

snippet: State authorities filed suit to block the closing of Sweet Briar College, giving a boost to alumnae and faculty who are fighting to save the 114-year-old women’s liberal arts institution.
